subject: Mixed Martial Arts
Law and Legislation
Lobbying and Lobbyists
Legislatures and Parliaments
lead_paragraph: The biggest fight in mixed martial arts this year will take place in Albany, as lobbyists try to persuade the Legislature to legalize the sport in New York State.
snippet: The biggest fight in mixed martial arts this year will take place in Albany, as lobbyists try to persuade the Legislature to legalize the sport in New York State.
